ContextLabel 1.6.0

May 8, 2019
Written by Michael
@michaelloistl

ContextLabel 1.6.0 supporting Swift 5 is now finally available. Huge thanks to Shyngys Kassymov for the PR and my apologies for the long wait to merge and push the updated pod.
